Uses of Class
acdp.exceptions.IllegalReferenceException

  • Packages that use IllegalReferenceException 
    Package Description
    acdp
    Contains the core interfaces needed to operate a database.
    acdp.design
    Contains classes for designing an ACDP database.

    • Uses of IllegalReferenceException in acdp

      Methods in acdp that throw IllegalReferenceException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Table.delete​(Ref ref)
      Deletes the referenced row from this table.
      Row Table.get​(Ref ref, Column<?>... columns)
      Returns the referenced row of this table.
      Table.TableIterator Table.iterator​(Ref ref, Column<?>... columns)
      Returns an iterator over the rows of this table starting with the first row that comes after the referenced row.
      void Table.update​(Ref ref, ColVal<?>... colVals)
      Updates the values of the specified columns of the referenced row with the specified new values.
